title: 'BEST FOR CIVIL SERVICES (MPPSC)'
body: It's the smoothest pen, never stops.  U just need use the Refill of this pen into some other pen as it doesn't have GRIP in it.

title: 'Very Smooth'
body: 'These pens are very smooth in writing. They have 0.6 mm ball point which is rare to get. Even the ergonomics are good. Go for it if you are a pen lover.'
